metadata.title: USN-6863-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use it to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystem:   - Netfilter; (CVE-2024-26924)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6863-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-headers-6.8.0-1006-raspi - 6.8.0-1006.6 linux-raspi-tools-6.8.0-1006 - 6.8.0-1006.6 linux-buildinfo-6.8.0-1006-raspi -
